g.title: public.applicants:recruitment_id->public.recruitments:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (recruitment_id) REFERENCES recruitments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

g.title: public.applicants:user_id->public.users:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

g.title: public.messages:applicant_id->public.applicants:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (applicant_id) REFERENCES applicants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
